Name: Arijit Singh Live in Concert
Description: Join India's most beloved playback singer Arijit Singh for his farewell tour across 15 Indian cities. Experience the magic of his soulful voice live.

Name: Comedy Night with Kapil Sharma
Description: India's comedy king Kapil Sharma brings his hilarious team for a live show that will leave you in splits. Featuring Sunil Grover, Krushna Abhishek and other special guests!

Name: Bharat: The Great Indian Musical
Description: Experience this spectacular musical journey through India's history, composed by Shankar Mahadevan. The show has received rave reviews from critics and audiences alike.

Name: Mahabharata: The Eternal Epic
Description: Kathak adaptation of the great epic featuring 100+ artists. Directed by Kathak legend Pt. Birju Maharaj.

Name: Tughlaq: The Political Drama
Description: Girish Karnad's classic play about the 14th century Sultan Muhammad bin Tughlaq. Hindi adaptation.

Name: Andha Yug: The Blind Age
Description: Powerful rendition of Dharamvir Bharati's Partition-era play. Multiple Sahitya Akademi award winner.

Name: Hayavadana: Experimental Theatre
Description: Girish Karnad's landmark play exploring identity through Indian folk theatre traditions.
